ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Equipment Upgrades.....
ygData.msgSnippet: Head - Crown of King Tranix (this one may take a while, but good luck)Earrings - 2 Black Sapphire Electrum Earrings (good luck on these too) Neck - Cape of
ygData.messageBody:
Head - Crown of King Tranix (this one may take a while, but good luck)Earrings - 2 Black Sapphire Electrum
Earrings (good luck on these too)
Neck - Cape of Midnight Mist, Mithril Torque, Runed Lava Pendant, or Glowing Bone Collar
Shoulders - Crested Spaulders
Breastplate - Black Enamored
Arms - Azure Sleeves
Bracers - 2 Lambent
Rings - 2 Fire Opal Platinum Rings or 2 Silver Jacinth Rings once you get a Tranix Crown and 2 Black
Sapphire Electrum Earrings
Boots - Lambent
Weapons - Electrum Bladed Wakizashi x2 if you're unsatisfied with your dex after making the above
adjustments

Maev Lorekeeper
Tarew Marr

> Head - Froglok Crown
> Earings - 2 Diamondines
> Face - Mask of Deception
> Neck - Golden BP Choker
> Shoulders - Carnel Pauldrons (from kobold priest)
> Breastplate - Mithril
> Cloak - Hooded Black Cloak
> Vambraces - Lambent
> Bracers - Both Serpentine (sigh)
> Gloves - Lambent
> Rings - 1 x +5 ac +55 hp's and 1 x +5 Str/Dex
> Belt - TBB/FBSS
> Greaves - Lambent
> Boots - Dwarven Work Boots
> Weapons - 2 Ykesha
>
> Instruments - Mistmoore Drums, Gypsy Lute, Lute of the Gypsy Princess,
> Brass Horn, Flute
>
